decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly assembling the Allosaurus Rider + Nourishing Shoal combo to get Griselbrand onto the battlefield. It includes a mix of ramp, tutoring, and protection spells to ensure the combo pieces come together smoothly. By using cards like Eldritch Evolution and Neoform, the deck can quickly tutor for the necessary creatures. Atraxa, Grand Unifier helps to boost the efficiency of the combo, while cards like Pact of Negation provide protection. The deck aims to win through a powerful combo finish, leveraging its toolkit of cards to get there efficiently.

The deck focuses on utilizing graveyard manipulation and sacrificing creatures to quickly bring out powerful reanimation targets like Archon of Cruelty and Emperor of Bones. By using cards like Persist and Faithless Looting, the deck can quickly fill up the graveyard and bring back high-impact creatures for a strong board presence. The combo potential is further enhanced with cards like Village Rites and Souls of the Lost, allowing for explosive plays and overwhelming the opponent with a relentless reanimation strategy. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and strategic plays to secure victory.

The deck focuses on efficiently ramping up mana using Amulet of Vigor and land bounce effects like Simic Growth Chamber to quickly cast Primeval Titan and search for key lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Urza's Saga. The combo potential is high with the ability to play multiple lands per turn, leading to explosive plays with cards like Scapeshift and Lotus Field. With the right setup, the deck can easily overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and game-changing spells, utilizing a mix of land manipulation and creature search to secure victory.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, backed up by powerful spells like Galvanic Discharge and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah. The deck also utilizes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Ocelot Pride to maintain board presence and control. The mana base is streamlined with dual lands like Sacred Foundry and fetch lands like Arid Mesa, ensuring consistent color availability for the aggressive strategy. The inclusion of cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Static Prison provide additional versatility and disruption to keep the pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and overwhelming the opponent with quick, efficient creatures and burn spells. By using a combination of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with disruptive spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial, the deck aims to control the board and reduce the opponent's life total as fast as possible. The inclusion of Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provides additional support by buffing creatures and locking down the opponent's board presence.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures using cards like Street Wraith, Cathartic Pyre, and Grisly Salvage, then use Living End to bring them all back to the battlefield. The deck also includes creatures that benefit from being returned this way, such as Bloodbraid Marauder and Overlord of the Balemurk. The combo potential is further enhanced by cards like Malevolent Rumble and Enduring Courage, allowing for explosive turns that can overwhelm opponents. The deck aims to win through a powerful graveyard recursion strategy that can quickly close out games.

The deck focuses on filling the graveyard with creatures like Striped Riverwinder and Curator of Mysteries, then casting Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield for a powerful combo. It also includes cards like Endurance and Generous Ent to help control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy, while cards like Force of Negation and Commandeer provide additional protection. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a large army of creatures and take control of the game.

The deck focuses on aggressive creature strategies with a combination of powerful enchantments and utility creatures to control the board and apply pressure on the opponent. It utilizes a mix of burn spells, token generators, and efficient creatures to quickly close out games while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Static Prison and Goblin Bombardment. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast, evasive threats and disruptive elements to secure victory.

The primary focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of powerful Eldrazi creatures, disruptive spells, and the UrzaTron lands which allow for large amounts of mana to be produced. Using cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, Eye of the Storms, the deck aims to quickly ramp up to play devastating threats such as Sire of Seven Deaths and Thought-Knot Seer. With the ability to disrupt opponents' strategies and quickly overwhelm them with powerful creatures, this Control - UrzaTron deck is designed to dominate the battlefield.

This deck focuses on using a combination of disruptive spells and efficient creatures to control the board and pressure the opponent with a fast tempo. By utilizing a blend of removal, counterspells, and versatile creatures like Ice-Fang Coatl and Shardless Agent, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up its own board presence. With a mix of card advantage engines like Fblthp, the Lost and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, the deck can outvalue opponents while maintaining a proactive game plan.

The focus of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with various counter spells and removal spells, while also utilizing cards that interact with the opponent's graveyard. The deck aims to prevent the opponent from developing their board, ultimately gaining control of the game and winning through a combination of incremental advantage and strategic card selection. With a mix of disruption, graveyard interaction, and card advantage, this deck seeks to outmaneuver and outlast opponents in a battle of attrition.
